name: Valorium
description:
Valorium

Valorium is a 3D interactive art historian simulator where you can physically interact with your tools for separate original cultural artifacts from their imitations. Made for "Cultural Heritage Game Jam" by team Sparks.

(All objects made by team Sparks)

SPARKS TEAM Alperen Erol İbrahim Torus Buğra ŞimşekFurkan TatarlıCan Teknikel Özhan AcarBerkay Emir Çufadar Sude Naz FakirSudenas TürkmenMuhammed KayacanOğuz Mazakİzzet Salcı
